analyze_video_for_tile_count.name: analyze_video_for_tile_count
analyze_video_for_tile_count.description: Use the '/tools/video_qa' API to analyze the video at '/Users/dylan/Desktop/1Res/osc/ComputerAgentWithVisionDev/GAIA/2023/test/0c393561-dd13-4b7c-ac49-20ac469aa276.MOV' with the prompt 'How many floor tiles are broken in the video?'

calculate_tile_sets_needed.name: calculate_tile_sets_needed
calculate_tile_sets_needed.description: Calculate the number of sets of 5 tiles needed based on the total count of broken tiles returned by the previous task.

calculate_grout_tubes_needed.name: calculate_grout_tubes_needed
calculate_grout_tubes_needed.description: Calculate the number of tubes of grout needed, knowing each tube sets 2 tiles, based on the total count of broken tiles.

calculate_total_cost.name: calculate_total_cost
calculate_total_cost.description: Calculate the total cost to replace all the tiles, including the cost of grout, assuming placeholders for the cost of a set of tiles and the cost per tube of grout.

report_total_cost.name: report_total_cost
report_total_cost.description: Report the total cost to replace all the broken floor tiles, including the cost of grout.
